partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: We are proud to collaborate with leading organizations and institutions from around the world.

hero.subtitle: Engineering robust data pipelines and scalable systems for the future. Explore our projects, research, and activities.

testimonialcard.description: Hear what participants are saying about our programs.

vision.subtitle: We believe in the potential of every young person and work to create opportunities where everyone can find their path in life.

card1.title: Safety
card1.description: We create safe environments where young people can be themselves and dare to grow.

card2.title: Community
card2.description: Together we are stronger. We build networks and lasting relationships.

card3.title: Development
card3.description: We provide tools and support for personal development and faith in the future.

latestNews.subtitle: Stay updated with our latest announcements and stories.

events.title: Upcoming Events
events.subtitle: Join us for our upcoming workshops, seminars, and camps.

cta.title: Get Involved
cta.subtitle: Whether you're a student, researcher, or potential partner, there are many ways to engage with our work.
